articles.title: Bill Richardson, former New Mexico governor and diplomat, dies at 75 - NPR
articles.description: Richardson, who previously served as U.S. ambassador to the United Nations, was also known for his volunteer efforts to free Americans held in foreign countries.
articles.content:
Former U.S. diplomat Bill Richardson speaks to reporters after a news conference in New York in 2021.
Seth Wenig/AP
